sentences.english: He would not sleep like a corpse, nor stt like a guest.
sentences.chinese: 孔子睡覺不像死屍那樣僵直，家居不像做客那樣端坐。

sentences.english: She conked out when she saw a dead body lying on the steps.
sentences.chinese: 當她看到一具死屍躺在臺階上時，她昏了過去。

sentences.english: As they raised him, a ring tinkled down and rolled across the floor.
sentences.chinese: 當他們擡起死屍時，有一隻戒指滾落在地板上了。

sentences.english: Bodies were still being pulled from the rubble late Monday.
sentences.chinese: 截止週一，死屍仍不斷從瓦礫堆裏被扒出。

sentences.english: You're the corpse in an English murder mystery.
sentences.chinese: 你就是英國神祕謀殺案裏的死屍。

sentences.english: From the start, everywhere the tender-hearted city-folk looked there was a dead animal.
sentences.chinese: 從到達那裏一開始，到處都能看到動物死屍。

sentences.english: He looked, in the act of opening the door, like a corpse adjusting his coffin lid.
sentences.chinese: 他開門的動作就象一具死屍在移動棺材蓋。

sentences.english: The villagers went to lay out the bodies in the battlefield.
sentences.chinese: 村民們前去陳殮戰場上的死屍。

sentences.english: I can't say anything just bodies all around and injured people. that was terrible.
sentences.chinese: 我看到周圍全是死屍和受傷的人，很恐怖。

sentences.english: The police believed that the dead man was Scudder, and that he had killed himself.
sentences.chinese: 警察相信那個死屍就是斯卡德爾，而且是自殺的。

sentences.english: Well, what do you do with the carcass of a ferocious monster?
sentences.chinese: 好，你會怎麼處理兇殘怪物的死屍？

sentences.english: She shuddered at the sight of the dead body.
sentences.chinese: 她一看到死屍就戰慄起來。

sentences.english: Ahriman is able to absorb souls of corpses to recover his strength.
sentences.chinese: 阿里曼可以吸取死屍的靈魂來恢復自身的力量。

sentences.english: With the other half he creates the land, the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 用死屍的下半部分，他創造了土地，也就是地球。

sentences.english: He that toucheth the dead body of any man shall be unclean seven days.
sentences.chinese: 摸了人死屍的，就必七天不潔淨。

definition: to dig into/to cut a mine into
to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
